group.label: Ethics approval and consent to participate
group.name: EthicsHeading

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: The family was consented for research-based genetic testing and establishment of cell lines according to protocols approved by the Duke University Health System Institutional Review Board (Pro00022846). In studies involving animals, all experiments involving the use of zebrafish (Danio rerio) were approved by the Duke University Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC).

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: Written informed consent for publication of clinical details and clinical images was obtained from the parent of the proband.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: SSV is on the medical advisory board for Ambry Genetics. NK is a paid consultant for and holds significant stock of Rescindo Therapeutics, Inc. All other authors confirmed that they have no competing interests.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: Springer Nature remains neutral with regard to jurisdictional claims in published maps and institutional affiliations.

publisher: Springer Science and Business Media LLC
